title: RP sets date for second bidding for KSK Mahanadi resolution
description: Resolution professional sets new EoI date for KSK Mahanadi Power after failed takeover bids. Debts, creditor details, and twists in resolution process highlighted. Concerns over supporting companies' value addressed by NCLT.
